summary: A bounty hunter escorts a killer to be tried for murder, but allows the man's outlaw brother to catch up with them to have a showdown over a previous shocking murder.
cast: Randolph Scott|Karen Steele|Pernell Roberts|James Best|Lee Van Cleef|James Coburn|Bennie E. Dobbins|Roy Jenson|Dyke Johnson|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Boyd Stockman
keywords: arizona territory|new mexico territory|new mexico desert|arizona desert|bisbee arizona
title: Cabalgar en solitario
